Class TimingExperiment

java.lang.Object
assign02.timing.TimingExperiment
Direct Known Subclasses:
FacilityLookupTimingExperiment
public abstract class TimingExperiment extends Object
Abstract base class for running timing experiments.

  • Constructor Details

    • TimingExperiment

      public TimingExperiment(String problemSizeDescription, int problemSizeMin, int problemSizeCount, int problemSizeStep, int experimentIterationCount)
      Constructs a general timing experiment.
      Parameters:
      problemSizeDescription - - description of the problem size for the experiment
      problemSizeMin - - minimum array size
      problemSizeCount - - number of array sizes to use in the experiment
      problemSizeStep - - step size between consecutive array sizes
      experimentIterationCount - - number of times to run computation for a given array size

    • computeMedianElapsedTime

      protected long computeMedianElapsedTime(int problemSize)
      Computes the median time elapsed to run the computation for a given problem size.
      Parameters:
      problemSize - - the problem size for one experiment
      Returns:
      the median elapsed time of the experiment iterations

    • computeElapsedTime

      protected long computeElapsedTime(int problemSize)
      Computes the time elapsed to run the computation once for a given problem size.
      Parameters:
      problemSize - - the problem size for one experiment
      Returns:
      the time elapsed
